verbs.description: In the wake of allegations that [ARGM-LOC: U.K] .- [V: based] [ARG1: political data firm Cambridge Analytica] mined information from 50 million Facebook profiles to target voters for Donald Trump in the 2016 presidential campaign , a push to delete the world ’s largest social media network has gained momentum among users , including in Oklahoma , looking for one last reason to leave the platform .
